target_roles.title: land-based machinery operator
target_roles.description: Land-based machinery operators operate specialised equipment and machinery for agricultural production and maintenance of landscape.
target_roles.essential_skills:
Road traffic laws
Mechanical tools
Understand instructions
Operate agricultural machinery
Identify plants characteristics
Work in a land-based team
Spread fertiliser
Plant disease control
Pesticides
Tow a tractor implement using the power take-off
Handle chemical products for soil and plants
Implement instructions
Harvest crop
Herbicides
Harvest cover crops
target_roles.optional_skills:
Prepare equipment for harvest
Fertiliser products
Create solutions to problems
Operate gps systems
Maintain mechanical equipment
Apply precision farming
Make independent operating decisions
Irrigate soil
Operate landscaping equipment
Fertilisation principles
Address problems critically
Load equipment
Use different communication channels
Perform loading and unloading operations
Agronomy
Variety of botanicals
Communicate with customers
Use a computer
Unload equipment
Environmental policy

missing_skills: Tow a tractor implement using the power take-off
Handle chemical products for soil and plants
